#5.1
Fast Track
Select the skill(s) you want to learn.  This lesson will include ONLY the skills that you select.  

You want to be able to:
  Welcome to the Performance Analyzer
  Setting up a Performance Experiment
  Running a Performance Experiment
  Understanding the Main Performance Analyzer Window
  Looking at Function Statistics in the Function List
  Looking at Function Statistics in Call Graph View
  Looking at Performance Statistics in a Source Code Display
  Analyzing Basic Resource Usage
  Mapping the Call Stack to Sample Points
  Looking at Resource Usage in Detail
  Focusing on a Phase
  For more Information on the Performance Analyzer


Are you finished selecting?
